name: Soul Food (Chopov1)
description:
A prototype idea for a farming co-op game where you destroy skeletons with food. You use the other player to aim. Can be played single player but it really tests your multitasking skills. Any feedback is much appreciated. This is my first solo project.

How to play:

Dig grass off of tiles to plant on them. Takes 4 scyth swings.

Harvest fully grown plants to send a projectile towards the other player. Your goal is to work together to get the projectile to hit enemies. 

A plant is fully grown when it has eyes.

Look at the first screenshot to see the stages of tiles, as well as what a harvestable plant looks like.
